title: Number of earthquakes in Italy 2018 - 2019 , by magnitude
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 5 number of Magnitudes.
Magnitude Magnitude 0+ has the highest Number of earthquakes and Magnitude 5.5+ has the lowest Number of earthquakes.
There is a difference of 21869.0 between the maximum Magnitude Magnitude 0+ and minimum Magnitude Magnitude 5.5+.
min_summary: This is a bar chart representing Magnitude in the x axis and Number of earthquakes in the y axis.
Magnitude Magnitude 0+ has the highest Number of earthquakes and Magnitude 5.5+ has the lowest Number of earthquakes.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Number of earthquakes for 5 number of Magnitudes.

max_summary: This bar chart has 5 columns on the x axis representing Magnitude, and Number of earthquakes in each Magnitude on the y axis.
Magnitude Magnitude 0+ has the highest Number of earthquakes and Magnitude 5.5+ has the lowest Number of earthquakes.
The highest Magnitude Magnitude 0+ has 21869.0 more Number of earthquakes than the lowest Magnitude Magnitude 5.5+.
